movies_collection.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies_collection.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

movies_collection.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies_collection.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

movies_collection.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
movies_collection.description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

movies_collection.title: Glass Onion
movies_collection.description: Famed Southern detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece for his latest case.

movies_collection.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
movies_collection.description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

movies_collection.title: Turning Red
movies_collection.description: A 13-year-old girl named Meilin turns into a giant red panda whenever she gets too excited.

movies_collection.title: Utama
movies_collection.description: In the Bolivian highlands, an elderly Quechua couple has been living the same daily life for years. During an uncommonly long drought, Virginio and his wife (Sisa) face a dilemma: resist or be defeated by the environment and time itself.

movies_collection.title: Bones and All
movies_collection.description: Maren, a young woman, learns how to survive on the margins of society.

movies_collection.title: Fire of Love
movies_collection.description: Intrepid scientists and lovers Katia and Maurice Krafft died in a volcanic explosion doing the very thing that brought them together: unraveling the mysteries of volcanoes by capturing the most explosive imagery ever recorded.

movies_collection.title: RRR (Rise Roar Revolt)
movies_collection.description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.

movies_collection.title: Cow
movies_collection.description: A close-up portrait of the daily lives of two cows.

movies_collection.title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
movies_collection.description: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

movies_collection.title: Boiling Point
movies_collection.description: Enter the relentless pressure of a restaurant kitchen as a head chef wrangles his team on the busiest day of the year.

movies_collection.title: Bergman Island
movies_collection.description: A couple retreat to the island that inspired Ingmar Bergman to write screenplays for their upcoming films when the lines between reality and fiction start to blur.

movies_collection.title: Jackass Forever
movies_collection.description: After 11 years, the Jackass crew is back for another crusade.

movies_collection.title: Prey
movies_collection.description: Naru, a skilled warrior of the Comanche Nation, fights to protect her tribe against one of the first highly-evolved Predators to land on Earth.

movies_collection.title: Gûzen to sôzô
movies_collection.description: An unexpected love triangle, a failed seduction trap and an encounter that results from a misunderstanding, told in three movements to depict three female characters and trace the trajectories between their choices and regrets.

movies_collection.title: Elvis
movies_collection.description: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

movies_collection.title: Ghahreman
movies_collection.description: Rahim is in prison because of a debt he was unable to repay. During a two-day leave, he tries to convince his creditor to withdraw his complaint against the payment of part of the sum. But things don't go as planned.

movies_collection.title: Benediction
movies_collection.description: Legendary 20th Century war poet Siegfried Sassoon's life-long quest for personal salvation through his experiences with family, war, his writing, and destructive relationships goes unresolved, never realizing it can only come from within.

movies_collection.title: The Woman King
movies_collection.description: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

movies_collection.title: Heojil kyolshim
movies_collection.description: A detective investigating a man's death in the mountains meets the dead man's mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing.

movies_collection.title: Nope
movies_collection.description: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

movies_collection.title: Im Westen nichts Neues
movies_collection.description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

movies_collection.title: Jaddeh Khaki
movies_collection.description: Follows a chaotic, tender family that is on a road trip across a rugged landscape and fussing over the sick dog and getting on each others' nerves. Only the mysterious older brother is quiet.

movies_collection.title: Three Minutes: A Lengthening
movies_collection.description: A snippet of 16mm film offers an emotionally charged, meditative glimpse into the lives of the unsuspecting Jewish citizens of a small Polish village at the precipice of World War II.

movies_collection.title: Brian and Charles
movies_collection.description: After a particularly harsh winter Brian goes into a deep depression; completely isolated and with no one to talk to, Brian does what any sane person would do when faced with such a melancholic situation. He builds a robot.

movies_collection.title: Triangle of Sadness
movies_collection.description: A fashion model celebrity couple join an eventful cruise for the super-rich.

movies_collection.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies_collection.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

movies_collection.title: An Cailín Ciúin
movies_collection.description: Rural Ireland 1981. A quiet, neglected girl is sent away from her dysfunctional family to live with foster parents for the summer. She blossoms in their care, but in this house where there are meant to be no secrets, she discovers one.

movies_collection.title: Living
movies_collection.description: In 1950s London, a humorless civil servant decides to take time off work to experience life after receiving a grim diagnosis.

movies_collection.title: L'événement
movies_collection.description: An adaptation of Annie Ernaux's novel of the same name, looking back on her experience with abortion when it was still illegal in France in the 1960s.

movies_collection.title: Verdens verste menneske
movies_collection.description: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.

movies_collection.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
movies_collection.description: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

movies_collection.title: Madres paralelas
movies_collection.description: The story of two mothers who bond in unexpected way after giving birth the same day.

movies_collection.title: Aftersun
movies_collection.description: Sophie reflects on the shared joy and private melancholy of a holiday she took with her father twenty years earlier. Memories real and imagined fill the gaps between as she tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't...

movies_collection.title: The Northman
movies_collection.description: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

movies_collection.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies_collection.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

movies_collection.title: Licorice Pizza
movies_collection.description: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.
